name: foodler
description: A simple modelling app for UMJI VE450 food 3d printer project.

scripts.deploy: rm -rf dist && parcel build ./src/index.html --public-url "./" && gh-pages -d dist
scripts.server: rm -rf dist && parcel build ./src/index.html --public-url "./" && python server.py

author: Wenxuan Zhu
